```{r}
# 1. Create a vector z as
# (3, -6, 7, 8)
z <- c(3, -6, 7, 8)
```

```{r}
# 2. Create a variable x as 10
x <- 10
```

```{r}
# 3. Find z*x
result <- z * x
```

```{r}
# 4. Create a list as (3, z, “hello”)
my_list <- list(3, z, "hello")
```

```{r}
# 5. Create a matrix as
#    3 5 6
#    4 7 8
#    5 7 3
my_matrix <- matrix(c(3, 4, 5, 5, 7, 7, 6, 8, 3), nrow = 3, ncol = 3, byrow = TRUE)
```
